Hi all,

 

 So new forum,

When I try to edit my threads its as if I'm looking at the preview setting of the last forum. How can I edit the thread properly? Once I add a Imgur album I cannot move it, or delete it..

 

 How the hell do you edit threads??

It's an adjustment, that's for sure. Some helpful things I've discovered:

Ctrl-Right click on an element reveals some options.

Selecting an element and pressing backspace will remove it.
